about_the_game:
Outlandia is a sandbox survival game set in the near future, with special focuses on building structures, ecosystem management and exploration.

After growing increasingly distraught with your boring office-worker life, you decide to invest all of your savings in the purchase of a revolutionary device - a BLDNet drone. This mechanical companion allows you to 3D print a diverse range of structures wherever you are, so long as you have access to the raw material resources in its cloud storage system. With this device, you depart on a journey into one of the few remaining wild areas of the World - Northern British-Columbia, Canada. Do you have what it takes to not just survive, but construct a home base that is a luxurious getaway in the wilderness?

Decompress in the world of Outlandia, where each path is original and open-ended. With no questlines, you are forced to make every decision for yourself, and truly forge your own reality in the vast wilderness. Choose to live in a humble cabin in the woods, or construct a vast automation system that is capable of harnessing all the powers of the natural world - but be careful, as the ecosystem you call your new home is very sensitive to intruders. Will you be able to maintain a balanced ecosystem while you build your mind’s creation, or will you be forced to suffer the consequences of a dangerous and changing climate?
